name: Oracle Inc.
description:
Oracle Inc. is a tiny game made for the Fantasy Game Jam of August 2020.

In the game, you play as an employee of Oracle Inc., a company delivering prophecies to people in need. Be sure to deliver the prophecy in time, else there shall be unforeseen consequences.

Dodge enemies and obstacles - there's no time to fight! Get to the end of each level as quickly as you can.

Controls:

  • AD or arrow keys to move,
  • Space to jump.

Game design & code by Tadeas Jun.
Music by TomatoHorse.
Graphics by TokeGameArt.


Known bugs:

  • Sloped surfaces are very buggy. Try not to jump to/from them, as the ground detection often bugs out around slopes.
